name: learn_outer_emotions
description: Analyzes image, video, or audio input to detect and learn outer emotions, which are emotions expressed externally through facial expressions, body language, and tone of voice.

audio_input.description: The audio input, in base64 format, containing the speech to analyze for tone and emotional expression. This is optional.

image_input.description: The image input, in base64 format, showing the outer emotions to be analyzed.

video_input.description: The video input, in base64 format, showing the outer emotions to be analyzed. This is optional.
